title: Gotham AND ...
content: For anyone that has worked with [Gotham](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321232626/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Gotham) or works with it frequently, what serif typefaces do you find pairs up well with it?
author: becker513

comments.content: Nearly anything. Depends on the project.

I picked Farnham and Bell both for their structural similarities with Gotham, but Stephen's right on the money.

By to by, are you in TypeCon, Stephen?
I yam. I must now leave my room to go help Shu finish hanging the [TypeGallery](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321232626/http:/www.typegallery.com/).
